#include <cmath>
#include <ctime>
#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include<cstdio>
#include<sstream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>
#include<cctype>
#include<list>
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define all(s) s.begin(),s.end()
#define f(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define F(i,a,b) for(i=a;i>=b;i--)
#define PI 3.1415926535897932384626433832795
#define INF 2000000000
#define BIG_INF 7000000000000000000LL
#define mp make_pair
#define eps 1e-9
#define mod 1000000007

typedef long long LL;

string inttostring(int n)
{
stringstream a;
a<<n;
return a.str();
}

int stringtoint(string A)
{
istringstream a(A);
int p;
a>>p;
return p;
}

int gcd(int a,int b)
{
return b==0?a:gcd(b,a%b);
}

struct myclass {
  bool operator() (int i,int j) { return (i<j);}
} myobject;
//vector<int> v (a, a+n);
//sort (v.begin(), v.end(), myobject);

int main()
{
    LL i,j,k,n,res,cn,cp,fl,t,l,r,a[200];
    string s;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
       cin>>n;
       f(i,0,n)
       {
           cin>>a[i];
        }
        F(i,n-1,1)
        {
            if(a[i]<a[i-1])
            {
                break;
            }

        }
        res=i;
        cout<<res<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
